test.name: 01 All AMT concepts with lauromacrogol 400 FSN, have more than one synonym

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where typeId = 900000000000013009 and conceptId in ( select conceptId from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where Binary term RLIKE Binary '[[:<:]]lauromacrogol 400[[:>:]]' and typeId = 900000000000003001 and conceptId in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active) and moduleId = 900062011000036108 ) group by conceptId having count(*) = 1;

test.name: 02 No AMT Preferred terms contain the laureth-9 (Excluding TPs)

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select conceptId from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where Binary term RLIKE Binary '[[:<:]]lauromacrogol 400[[:>:]]' and typeId = 900000000000003001 and conceptId in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active) and moduleId = 900062011000036108 and BINARY get_cr_ADRS_PT(conceptId) RLIKE '[[:<:]]laureth-9[[:>:]]';

test.name: 03 No AMT non-PT synonym contains the lauromacrogol 400 (Excluding TPs)

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where typeId = 900000000000013009 and conceptId in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active) and conceptId in ( select conceptId from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where Binary term RLIKE Binary '[[:<:]]lauromacrogol 400[[:>:]]' and typeId = 900000000000003001 and conceptId in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active) and moduleId = 900062011000036108 ) and id not in (select referencedComponentId from <PROSPECTIVE>.langrefset_active where refsetId = 32570271000036106 and value1 = 900000000000548007) and BINARY term RLIKE '[[:<:]]lauromacrogol 400[[:>:]]';
